title: Rudy Giuliani, Herschel Walker, Vote, Steve and Marjorie Anniversary and more.
itunes:title: Rudy Giuliani, Herschel Walker, Vote, Steve and Marjorie Anniversary and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  How do you wash it?  The CLO is the master when it comes to matters of the heart and his answers are smooth.  Steve reassures a discouraged single mother that she is not alone and is just fine.  The slapper of RG called him an F'n Scumbag for his role in Roe VS Wade.  Steve's answers for the dating app or blind date made Would You Rather shine today.  Happy 15th Anniversary to Mr. and Mrs. H!  WTF is up with Herschel Walker?  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog points out the idiotic sound of Herschel Walker and has a caller from Chi-Town giving his two cents.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
